info.name: Make Clickable: Follow Forum/Topic,New
info.description: This makes the three buttons clickable across the entire button. Previously they were only clickable on the text part.
info.additionalInfo:
It took me 2 and a half hours. This was frustrating to figure out, but worth it in terms of teaching myself.
I'm sure a smarter or more experienced person could do it in 15 minutes.
